ere are the triplets extracted from the text:

<The Black Book of the Admiralty
1:
--------------------
Text: Black Book of the Admiralty:  Its starting point is the Rolls of Oléron, which were promulgated in c. 1160 by Eleanor of Aquitaine, although the "Black Book" is undoubtedly later.
Triplets:<Black Book of the Admiralty
2:
--------------------
Text: Black Book of the Admiralty:  The book itself states that the High Court of Admiralty was established during the reign of Edward I (1272–1307), although more recent scholarship places the establishment at c. 1360 during the reign of Edward III.
Triplets:<The High Court of Admiralty
